descriptionProfile: National Geographic Creative Photographer & Filmmaker - Pulitzer Center Contributor - Documenting critical environmental issues in Asia.
National Geographic Creative Photographer & Filmmaker - Pulitzer Center Contributor - Documenting critical environmental issues in Asia.

posts.description: 'Korean Reflections - Images from across the divide' #5 & #6. In 2009, I had the unique opportunity to travel into North Korea. Posing as a tourist, I travelled with the Canadian national newspaper, The Globe and Mail, gaining a unique and early insight into life in the secretive state. Around the same time, I also had the opportunity to visit South Korea. On my return home, I noticed something very strange in my images. Moments of life from either side of the border seemed to reflect one another. The more I looked, the more of these 'reflections' I found. I present these images together, the first from the North, the second from the South. --- As tensions rise once again on the Korean Peninsula, I think it's pertinent to share these images in an effort to understand the similarities and differences reflected between the two divided nations. In this sequence, you will view NK/SK/NK/SK. #asia #korea #southkorea #northkorea #seoul #pyongyang @natgeocreative

In this sequence, you will view NK/SK/NK/SK. #asia #korea #southkorea #northkorea #seoul @natgeocreative

'Korean Reflections - Images from across the divide'. In 2009, I had the unique opportunity to travel into North Korea. Posing as a tourist, I travelled with the Canadian national newspaper, The Globe and Mail, gaining a unique and early insight into life in the secretive state. Around the same time, I also had the opportunity to visit South Korea. On my return home, I noticed something very strange in my images. Moments of life from either side of the border seemed to reflect one another. The more I looked, the more of these 'reflections' I found. I present these images together, the first from the North, the second from the South. --- As tensions rise once again on the Korean Peninsula, I think it's pertinent to share these images in an effort to understand the similarities and differences reflected between the two divided nations. #asia #korea #southkorea #northkorea #seoul

A fisherman paddles his boat through wetlands on the outskirts of Kolkata. --- Coastal cities in India have been identified as some of the most at risk to climate change effects, such as rising sea levels. In late 2016 however, Kolkata was named as one of the 11 best cities in the world for addressing the effects of climate change at the C40 Mayor's Summit in Mexico City. "Kolkata’s climate change risks have been exacerbated by unsanitary disposal and waste dumping...[The city's] project aims to eradicate open dumping and burning of waste and to limit the concentration of methane gas generated in landfill sites." A promising step for one of the world's most vulnerable cities. --- @natgeocreative @pulitzercenter --- #asia #india #kolkata #water #climatechange

A man stands in the Ganges River at sunset, near the Howrah bridge in Kolkata. Upon entering the city, the river is saturated with a mix of domestic and industrial waste that has accumulated as it has passed through numerous states in northern India, making it one of the most polluted rivers in the world. --- Coastal cities in India, such as Kolkata and Mumbai, have been identified as some of the most at risk to climate change effects, such as rising sea levels. In late 2016 however, Kolkata was named as one of the 11 best cities in the world for addressing the effects of climate change at the C40 Mayor's Summit in Mexico City. "Kolkata’s climate change risks have been exacerbated by unsanitary disposal and waste dumping...[The city's] project aims to eradicate open dumping and burning of waste and to limit the concentration of methane gas generated in landfill sites." A promising step for one of the world's most vulnerable cities. --- @natgeocreative @pulitzercenter --- #asia #india #kolkata #water #ganges #pollution #climatechange

On the outskirts of Kolkata, men carry baskets of leather trimmings to a large cauldron for burning. The small pieces are burnt, dried and then sold for use as fertilizer or as food for farm animals. Burning of the leather produces harmful gases that are released into the air. Workers often have little to no protection. --- Coastal cities in India, such as Kolkata and Mumbai, have been identified as some of the most at risk to climate change effects, such as rising sea levels. In late 2016 however, Kolkata was named as one of the 11 best cities in the world for addressing the effects of climate change at the C40 Mayor's Summit in Mexico City. "Kolkata’s climate change risks have been exacerbated by unsanitary disposal and waste dumping...[The city's] project aims to eradicate open dumping and burning of waste and to limit the concentration of methane gas generated in landfill sites." A promising step for one of the world's most vulnerable cities. --- @natgeocreative @pulitzercenter --- #asia #india #kolkata #leathergoods #pollution #climatechange #environment

Foam floats on the surface of the Bhangar Canal, on the eastern outskirts of Kolkata. Flowing off of the nearby Vidyadhari River, the canal receives water mostly from nearby factories. At various points along the canal, wastewater is released into the nearby waterway. At sluice gates nearby, the water has turned to foam as the waste water is churned up. --- Coastal cities in India, such as Kolkata and Mumbai, have been identified as some of the most at risk to climate change effects, such as rising sea levels. In late 2016 however, Kolkata was named as one of the 11 best cities in the world for addressing the effects of climate change at the C40 Mayor's Summit in Mexico City. "Kolkata’s climate change risks have been exacerbated by unsanitary disposal and waste dumping...[The city's] project aims to eradicate open dumping and burning of waste and to limit the concentration of methane gas generated in landfill sites." A promising step for one of the world's most vulnerable cities. --- @natgeocreative @pulitzercenter --- #asia #india #kolkata #water #pollution
